name: Character typology
description: Questions to help you better understand the character and personality of someone

name: Digital trace
description: Keep track of the digital presence of someone on the internet

name: Basic information
description: General questions to help you remember basic information about someone

name: Work
description: Professional history and information like salary or current position

name: Goals, fears and motivation
description: List of questions to help you understand what motivates someone

name: Skills and abilities
description: Remember the skills and abilities like sports or musical instruments

name: Education
description: To remember things like the field of study, level of achieved education, or someone's expertise

name: Family and relationships
description: Familiarize yourself with someone's family situation and relationships

name: Details to remember
description: List of questions and details that might be useful if you remember them

name: Physical appearance
description: When you need to remember little things like shoes or ring sizes
